cause.description:
The FSPA exists to promote the art of string playing and the result of such skillful artistry: some of the most famous music in history, from Handel to Hendrix and beyond. Anyone who plays a stringed instrument can join! Piano, Violin, Viola, 'Cello, Bass, Guitar, Bass Guitar, Citar, Harp, Dulcimer, Zither, Harpsichord, Lute, Mandolin, Clavichord, Banjo, and Fiddle players welcome!
A good list of stringed instruments from around the world can be found at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_string_instruments.
1. Stinged instruments produce some of the most beautiful music.
2. Stringed instruments are some of the oldest instruments.
3. Many stringed instruments require great skill and accuracy to play.
cause.mission: To promote the art and skill of string playing.
cause.name: World String Players' Association
